title: My game ALT F4'd it self.
body:
So  I was in a game when it started to "Attempting to Reconnect" I eventually exited the game and went to relog and connect back to game, however I was back in the lobby and I could que up for another game, I couldn't reconnect to my previous game no matter, we didnt surrender and it was only 17 mins in game. IT doesnt show up on OP.gg or my match history. The game literally doesn't exist for me anymore.

Hope this doesnt count for leaver buster...

Regards

replies.body: That usually means there was an error on riots end and everyone was kicked from the game, and as there are no players participating in that game it automatically finishes and no results are recorded.
It doesn't count for leaver buster. It's happened to me on numerous occasions, mostly a few patches ago, but then it got fixed. However, I'm finding that it's come back again this patch.
